languages.text: "Мы приняли бой на мире Кемальт Секундус, в Маркайновой марке, что в секторе Каликсис. Презренные враги Человечества повадились совершать рейды в этой области, и нам было доверено оборонить добрых подданных Империума".

"We engaged the enemy on the world of Kemalt Secundus in the Markayn Marches of the Calixis Sector. The loathsome foes of Humanity were known to launch raids in the area, so we received orders to defend the good subjects of the Imperium."
languages.original_text: "Мы приняли бой на мире Кемальт Секундус, в Маркайновой марке, что в секторе Каликсис. Презренные враги Человечества повадились совершать рейды в этой области, и нам было доверено оборонить добрых подданных Империума".

traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: "We engaged the enemy on the world of Kemalt Secundus in the Markayn Marches of the Calixis Sector. The loathsome foes of Humanity were known to launch raids in the area, so we received orders to defend the good subjects of the Imperium."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “当时，我们前往卡利西斯星区的马凯恩之征，在柯玛特二号星上与敌人交战。那个世界遭到了该死的人类之敌的袭击。我们接到了命令，要保护那片区域的忠诚臣民。”
languages.original_text: "We engaged the enemy on the world of Kemalt Secundus in the Markayn Marches of the Calixis Sector. The loathsome foes of Humanity were known to launch raids in the area, so we received orders to defend the good subjects of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: “当时，我们前往卡利西斯星区的马凯恩之征，在柯玛特二号星上与敌人交战。那个世界遭到了该死的人类之敌的袭击。我们接到了命令，要保护那片区域的忠诚臣民。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「キャリクシス星域のマルカイン・マーチにある惑星ケマルト・セクダスで敵と交戦しました。人類の憎むべき敵がこの地域で襲撃を開始することが知られていたため、帝国の善良な臣民を守るよう命令を受けました」
languages.original_text: "We engaged the enemy on the world of Kemalt Secundus in the Markayn Marches of the Calixis Sector. The loathsome foes of Humanity were known to launch raids in the area, so we received orders to defend the good subjects of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: 「キャリクシス星域のマルカイン・マーチにある惑星ケマルト・セクダスで敵と交戦しました。人類の憎むべき敵がこの地域で襲撃を開始することが知られていたため、帝国の善良な臣民を守るよう命令を受けました」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Nos enfrentamos al enemigo en el mundo de Kemalt Secundus en las Marchas de Markayn del sector Calixis. Sabíamos que los odiosos enemigos de la Humanidad estaban lanzando asaltos contra esa zona, de modo que recibimos órdenes de defender a los buenos súbditos del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "We engaged the enemy on the world of Kemalt Secundus in the Markayn Marches of the Calixis Sector. The loathsome foes of Humanity were known to launch raids in the area, so we received orders to defend the good subjects of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: «Nos enfrentamos al enemigo en el mundo de Kemalt Secundus en las Marchas de Markayn del sector Calixis. Sabíamos que los odiosos enemigos de la Humanidad estaban lanzando asaltos contra esa zona, de modo que recibimos órdenes de defender a los buenos súbditos del Imperium».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "We engaged the enemy on the world of Kemalt Secundus in the Markayn Marches of the Calixis Sector. The loathsome foes of Humanity were known to launch raids in the area, so we received orders to defend the good subjects of the Imperium."

languages.text: « Nous avons engagé le combat contre l'ennemi sur le monde de Kemalt Secundus, dans les Marches de Markayn du secteur Calixis. Nous avions reçu l'ordre de défendre les sujets de l'Imperium contre les misérables ennemis de l'humanité qui faisaient régulièrement des raids dans la région. »
languages.original_text: "We engaged the enemy on the world of Kemalt Secundus in the Markayn Marches of the Calixis Sector. The loathsome foes of Humanity were known to launch raids in the area, so we received orders to defend the good subjects of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons engagé le combat contre l'ennemi sur le monde de Kemalt Secundus, dans les Marches de Markayn du secteur Calixis. Nous avions reçu l'ordre de défendre les sujets de l'Imperium contre les misérables ennemis de l'humanité qui faisaient régulièrement des raids dans la région. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Wir griffen den Feind auf der Welt Kemalt Secundus in den Markayn-Marken des Calixis-Sektors an. Die widerlichen Feinde der Menschheit führten in dem Gebiet Überfälle durch, also erhielten wir den Befehl, die braven Untertanen des Imperiums zu verteidigen."
languages.original_text: "We engaged the enemy on the world of Kemalt Secundus in the Markayn Marches of the Calixis Sector. The loathsome foes of Humanity were known to launch raids in the area, so we received orders to defend the good subjects of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Wir griffen den Feind auf der Welt Kemalt Secundus in den Markayn-Marken des Calixis-Sektors an. Die widerlichen Feinde der Menschheit führten in dem Gebiet Überfälle durch, also erhielten wir den Befehl, die braven Untertanen des Imperiums zu verteidigen."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Düşmanla Calixis Sektörü'ndeki Kemalt Secundus dünyasının Markayn Sınırı'nda savaştık. İnsanlığın iğrenç düşmanları o civara baskınlar düzenliyordu, biz de İmparatorluğun hayırlı evlatlarını koruma emri almıştık."
languages.original_text: "We engaged the enemy on the world of Kemalt Secundus in the Markayn Marches of the Calixis Sector. The loathsome foes of Humanity were known to launch raids in the area, so we received orders to defend the good subjects of the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Düşmanla Calixis Sektörü'ndeki Kemalt Secundus dünyasının Markayn Sınırı'nda savaştık. İnsanlığın iğrenç düşmanları bu bölgede baskın düzenliyordu, biz de İmparatorluğun hayırlı evlatlarını koruma emri almıştık."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
